summary: Sync yield dependencies produce broken error tracebacks that do not show the actual exception location, while async yield dependencies show correct tracebacks.
symptoms: 500 Internal Server Error with incomplete traceback
Traceback does not show line where exception was raised for sync yield dependencies
Async yield dependencies show correct traceback with exception location
suspected_root_cause: Difference in how sync vs async yield dependencies handle exception context in Python 3.11, possibly related to contextmanager_in_threadpool implementation
